description: The Nazis removed Jewish names from the German phonetic alphabet - now a reform is coming.
title: Germany to wipe Nazi traces from phonetic alphabet
title_page: Germany to wipe Nazi traces from phonetic alphabet - BBC News
maintext: In order to preserve the memory of the anti-Semitic list, it will be presented as an annex to the new list to be put to a public consultation next year. After that discussion, the new German list is to be adopted in late 2022.
